docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
Install AgaveChem with pip directly from this repo:

pip install git+https://github.com/denovochem/agave_chem.git

docs.title: Basic Usage
docs.text:
Load AgaveChemMapper and atom-map a reaction: 

from agave_chem import AgaveChemMapper

mapper = AgaveChemMapper()
mapped_reaction = mapper.map_reaction("CC(Cl)(Cl)OC(C)(Cl)Cl.CC(=O)C(=O)O>>CC(=O)C(=O)Cl")

print(mapped_reaction)

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: AgaveChem supports Python versions >=3.10. There are no required dependencies.

docs.title: Installation Option #1: Use pip (recommended)
docs.text:
Install AgaveChem with pip directly from the github repo:

pip install git+https://github.com/denovochem/agave_chem.git

docs.title: Installation Option #2: Clone the repository
docs.text:
Install the latest version of AgaveChem from GitHub. The version on GitHub is not guaranteed to be stable, but may include new features not available using other install options. Clone the repository and install:

git clone https://github.com/denovochem/agave_chem.git
cd agave_chem
pip install .
